text: Salvador Sadurní Urpí (born 3 April 1941) is a Spanish retired footballer. He played as a goalkeeper. He made ten appearances for the Spain national football team between 1963 until 1969. ==References== ==Other websites== * *FC Barcelona profile * * *Spain stats at Eu-Football Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish footballers
title: Salvador Sadurní
